title: What are some of the best universities for a degree in development studies? - Quora

response.answer_text: My top seven picks. Randomly stated below (not based on any hierarchy of preference or ratings) => SOAS (School of Oriental and African Studies) - UOL (University of London).LSE -UOLISS - HagueOXFORDCAMBRIDGE (check online for details),HARVARD (MPA program at Kennedy school of government)PRINCETON (not too sure now, but they did offer an MS in International Development and Economics sometime back. Do re-check online plz).
